instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1534: What is A1534? A1534 is a model number for a 12 inch size Macbook  from years 2015, 2016 with EMC 2746, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00045, 820-00244..

threads.title: EFI lock appeared after install os via recovery? WTF
threads.message: Hello guys i was reinstalling the OS on a Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> EMC2991 via internet recovery. After waiting some time, the computer started flashing a folder symbol. Now every time i try to boot into recovery it shows me a EFI lock. Any idea why im getting this lock now? If the computer had a lock it wouldnt have let me reinstall the os. im so confused. Thanks!

threads.title: EFI lock appeared after install os via recovery? WTF
threads.message: Someone remote locked it through their iCloud because it is stolen.

threads.title: EFI lock appeared after install os via recovery? WTF
threads.message: its not stolen Duke :( i bought it from a auction. I was just confused why it didnt show me the efi lock before allowing me to reinstall the os. Thanks for your input
